Title: Carte Blanche
Plot: Now that Vic is back to work, he and Shane go undercover as dirty cops to find the man behind a robbery/murder.  Meanwhile, Dutch and Claudette track down an old rival of Claudette's after a turned in gun is connected to a previous case.  And in an attempt to get the Asian vote in the election, David assigns Julien and Danny to watch over a Korean parish.
GuestStars: Cathy Cahlin Ryan, Don Maloney, RonReaco Lee, Cheryl White, Lucinda Jenney, Chris Payne Gilbert, Shaun Duke, Veena Bidasha
